entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 12 near Lake Superior. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 18 except 12 near Lake Superior. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
